# iosxr_interface_tunnel_te (Data Source)

This data source can read the Interface Tunnel TE configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_interface_tunnel_te" "example" {
  name = "100"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) tunnel-te interface ID

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `affinity_mask` (String) Affinity attribute mask value
- `affinity_value` (String) Affinity attribute value
- `auto_bw_adjustment_threshold_min` (Number) Set the bandwidth change value to trigger adjustment
- `auto_bw_adjustment_threshold_percent` (Number) Set the bandwidth change threshold to trigger adjustment
- `auto_bw_collect_only` (Boolean) Enable bandwidth collection only, no auto-bw adjustment
- `auto_bw_limit_max` (Number) Set maximum bandwidth auto-bw can apply on a tunnel
- `auto_bw_limit_min` (Number) Set minimum bandwidth auto-bw can apply on a tunnel
- `auto_bw_overflow_limit` (Number) Set the number of consecutive collections exceeding threshold
- `auto_bw_overflow_min` (Number) Set the bandwidth change value to trigger an overflow
- `auto_bw_overflow_threshold` (Number) Set the bandwidth change percent to trigger an overflow
- `auto_bw_resignal_last_bandwidth_timeout` (Number) Set the bandwidth resignal time-out value (in seconds) After this time the tunnel will be signaled with the configured bandwidth
- `auto_bw_underflow_limit` (Number) Set the number of consecutive collections exceeding threshold
- `auto_bw_underflow_min` (Number) Set the bandwidth change value to trigger an underflow
- `auto_bw_underflow_threshold` (Number) Set the bandwidth change percent to trigger an underflow
- `autoroute_announce` (Boolean) Announce tunnel to IGP
- `autoroute_announce_exclude_traffic_segment_routing` (Boolean) Exclude segment-routing traffic from the autoroute announced tunnel
- `autoroute_announce_include_ipv6` (Boolean) Announce tunnel as an IPv6 AA also
- `autoroute_announce_metric` (Number) Set constant metric
- `autoroute_announce_metric_absolute` (Number) Set metric mode absolute
- `autoroute_announce_metric_relative` (Number) Set metric mode relative
- `autoroute_destinations` (Attributes List) Adds static route to destination (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--autoroute_destinations))
- `backup_bw_class_type` (String) Specify the bandwidth class type
- `backup_bw_pool_type` (String) Configure pool type for backup bandwidth
- `backup_bw_unlimited` (Boolean) Unlimited backup bandwidth
- `backup_bw_value` (Number) Bandwidth requirement in kbps
- `bandwidth` (Number) Set the bandwidth of an interface
- `bfd_bringup_timeout` (Number) Timeout before BFD session bring up is aborted (seconds)
- `bfd_dampening_initial_wait` (Number) Initial delay before bringing up tunnel (milliseconds)
- `bfd_dampening_maximum_wait` (Number) Maximum delay before bringing up tunnel (milliseconds)
- `bfd_dampening_secondary_wait` (Number) Secondary delay before bringing up tunnel (milliseconds)
- `bfd_encap_gal` (Boolean) Use GAL encapsulation mode for BFD
- `bfd_fast_detect` (Boolean) Enable BFD fast detection
- `bfd_lsp_ping_disable` (Boolean) Disable periodic LSP ping
- `bfd_lsp_ping_interval` (Number) Periodic LSP ping interval in seconds
- `bfd_minimum_interval` (Number) BFD hello interval in milliseconds
- `bfd_multiplier` (Number) BFD detect multiplier
- `bfd_sbfd` (Boolean) Enable Seamless BFD
- `bidirectional_association_co_routed_fault_oam` (Boolean) Enable fault OAM
- `bidirectional_association_co_routed_signaling_protection_object_disable` (Boolean) Disable signaling of RSVP Protection Object
- `bidirectional_association_co_routed_wrap_protection` (Boolean) Enable LSP Wrap protection feature
- `bidirectional_association_corouted` (Boolean) Co-routed LSPs (with bidirectional CSPF)
- `bidirectional_association_global_id` (Number) Global ID for association global source
- `bidirectional_association_id` (Number) Unique association ID
- `bidirectional_association_source_address` (String) Source IP address
- `binding_sid_mpls_label` (Number) Specify label value
- `description` (String) Set description for this interface
- `destination` (String) Specify tunnel destination
- `fast_reroute` (Boolean) Specify MPLS tunnel can be fast-rerouted
- `fast_reroute_protect_bandwidth` (Boolean) Enable bandwidth protection request
- `fast_reroute_protect_node` (Boolean) Enable node protection request
- `forward_class` (Number) Forward class for the tunnel (default value 0)
- `forwarding_adjacency` (Boolean) Enable tunnel as a forwarding-adjacency and enter its submode
- `forwarding_adjacency_holdtime` (Number) Hold time in ms
- `forwarding_adjacency_include_ipv6` (Boolean) Announce tunnel as an IPv6 FA also
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `ipv4_address` (String) IP address
- `ipv4_forwarding_enable` (Boolean) enable ipv4 forwarding on a interface
- `ipv4_netmask` (String) IP subnet mask
- `ipv4_ttl_propagate_disable` (Boolean) Disable ipv4 ttl propagation on this interface
- `ipv4_unnumbered` (String) Enable IP processing without an explicit address
- `ipv6_enable` (Boolean) Enable IPv6 on interface
- `ipv6_ttl_propagate_disable` (Boolean) Disable ipv6 ttl propagation on this interface
- `load_interval` (Number) Specify interval for load calculation for an interface
- `load_share` (Number) Specify tunnel load-sharing metric
- `logging_events_all` (Boolean) Enable all logging for this tunnel
- `logging_events_bfd_status` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP BFD-STATUS change alarms
- `logging_events_link_status` (Boolean) Enable interface and line-protocol state change alarms
- `logging_events_lsp_bw_change` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP BANDWIDTH change alarms
- `logging_events_lsp_insufficient_bw` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP INSUFFICIENT-BANDWIDTH change alarms
- `logging_events_lsp_record_route` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP RECORD-ROUTE change alarms
- `logging_events_lsp_reoptimize` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP REOPT change alarms
- `logging_events_lsp_reoptimize_attempts` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP REOPT attempts change alarms
- `logging_events_lsp_reroute` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP REROUTE change alarms
- `logging_events_lsp_state` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP UP/DOWN change alarms
- `logging_events_lsp_switchover` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP SWITCHOVER change alarms
- `logging_events_pcalc_failure` (Boolean) Enable interface LSP PCALC-FAILURE change alarms
- `mpls_mtu` (Number) Set the MPLS MTU for the interface
- `path_options` (Attributes List) Primary or fallback path setup option (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--path_options))
- `path_protection` (Boolean) Enable the path protection feature on this tunnel
- `path_protection_non_revertive` (Boolean) Enable Non-Revertive mode
- `path_protection_srlg_diverse` (Boolean) Enforce SRLG diversity for protecting LSP
- `path_selection_cost_limit` (Number) Cost limit configuration
- `path_selection_delay_limit` (Number) Delay limit configuration
- `path_selection_hop_limit` (Number) Hop limit configuration
- `path_selection_metric_delay` (Boolean) Use delay metric
- `path_selection_metric_igp` (Boolean) Use IGP metric
- `path_selection_metric_te` (Boolean) Use TE metric
- `path_selection_tiebreaker_max_fill` (Boolean) Prefer the path with the most-utilized links
- `path_selection_tiebreaker_min_fill` (Boolean) Prefer the path with the least-utilized links
- `path_selection_tiebreaker_random` (Boolean) Prefer a path with links utilized randomly
- `policy_classes` (List of String) Tunnel policy class values (1-7 or default)
- `priority_hold` (Number) Hold Priority
- `priority_setup` (Number) Tunnel priority
- `record_route` (Boolean) Record the route used by the tunnel
- `shutdown` (Boolean) shutdown the given interface
- `signalled_bandwidth` (Number) Bandwidth requirement in kbps
- `signalled_bandwidth_class_type` (Number) Specify the bandwidth class type
- `signalled_bandwidth_sub_pool` (Boolean) Specify sub-pool bandwidth
- `signalled_name` (String) The signaling name to assign to tunnel
- `soft_preemption` (Boolean) Enable the soft-preemption feature on this tunnel

### Nested Schema for `autoroute_destinations`

Read-Only:

- `address` (String) Adds static route to destination


<a id="nestedatt--path_options"></a>
### Nested Schema for `path_options`

Read-Only:

- `attribute_set` (String) Specify attribute-set name (max 64 char)
- `dynamic` (Boolean) Setup based on dynamically allocated path
- `explicit_path_id` (Number) Specify an IP explicit path by number
- `explicit_path_name` (String) Specify an IP explicit path by name
- `explicit_path_verbatim` (Boolean) Do not require topology database for explicit path
- `isis_instance` (String) IS-IS instance name
- `isis_level` (Number) IS-IS level
- `lockdown` (Boolean) Not a candidate for reoptimization
- `lockdown_sticky` (Boolean) Force tunnel to remain on the same path
- `ospf_area_id` (Number) OSPF area ID as a decimal value
- `ospf_area_ip_format` (String) OSPF area ID in IP address format
- `ospf_instance` (String) OSPF instance name
- `preference` (Number) Preference for this path option
- `protected_by_index` (Number) Index of the protecting path-option
- `protected_by_index_secondary` (Number) Index of the secondary protecting path-option
